Package sbw.architecture.bus.protocol

Interface I_Servicer<_PAYLOAD_ extends A_Payload<?,?>>

Type Parameters:
_PAYLOAD_ - - the payload type
All Superinterfaces:
I_Identifiable
All Known Implementing Classes:
A_Actuator, A_ActuatorAileron, A_ActuatorAngled, A_ActuatorElevator, A_ActuatorEngine, A_ActuatorFlap, A_ActuatorGear, A_ActuatorGearMain, A_ActuatorGearNose, A_ActuatorRudder, A_Component, A_Controller, ActuatorAileron, ActuatorElevator, ActuatorEngine, ActuatorFlapFowler, ActuatorFlapSplit, ActuatorGearMain, ActuatorGearNose, ActuatorRudder, ControllerAileron, ControllerElevator, ControllerEngine, ControllerFlap, ControllerGear, ControllerRudder
public interface I_Servicer<_PAYLOAD_ extends A_Payload<?,?>> extends I_Identifiable
Defines the contract that a servicer must follow to connect to a bus.

    Description
    Bus

    Gets the bus to which this servicer is connected.

    notify_(Notification<_PAYLOAD_> notification)
    Notifies this servicer that one or more of its requests have been processed.
    Response

    Submits a cancel request to this servicer.
    Response
    processRequest_(RequestInform<_PAYLOAD_> request)

    Submits a terminate request to this servicer.

    submitRequest_(RequestService<?> request)
    Submits a service request to this servicer.
    void
    update_()
    Updates the scheduled requests for this servicer based on the current time and processes them accordingly.
